DELETE FROM "InboxState" AS i
WHERE i."Id" IN (
    SELECT i0."Id"
    FROM "InboxState" AS i0
    WHERE i0."Delivered" IS NOT NULL AND i0."Delivered" < @__removeTimestamp_0

    LIMIT @__p_1
